headline: Tariff-Driven Dollar Woes Help Brighten First-Quarter Earnings
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Tariffs unexpectedly devaluing the US dollar — and in turn boosting corporate earnings — was one of the few bright spots of the first-quarter earnings season in North America.
